column2: "Tickets are required to change paid salon options. Please purchase them in advance."

"This function is currently suspended.
詳しくは各運営会社HPにてご確認ください。"

"You can't create a new character at the moment.

"You can't rename this character at the moment.

"エステの有償部分の変更は、チケットが必要となっています。
事前に購入をお願いします。
詳しくは運営会社のＨＰをご確認ください。"
